comments.author: osamneska
comments.body: I have 3x 3080Ti in my rig and 2 of them now can achieve 73.4 unlock vs 70 previously, but the last one can't even mine with gminer 2.75. No lock detected and hashrate keeps falling down. All 3 cards are the same model from Zotac and have the same BIOS. Have to stick to 2.74, and also really unpleased about devfee increase....

comments.body: Just Loaded up your miner on three of my pc's with the default tuning taking around 1 hours on a Ryzan 5 3600 and a I7 7700k.My 3960x Threadripper took 8 hours to get through the default tune.... I'm assuming because it has 24 threads and not 12 like the AMD 3600 its taking 4x longer?or am I missing something that's not quite right?Thanks!

comments.body: Hi,Version WildRig 0.30.8 doesn't work with my AMD Vega64. A second RX480/8GB is also in the rig. Problem is -> low difficulty and rejecting from server.I checked it with driver 20.3.x and 21.11.3. (Windows 10).Difficulty by the Vega is 27 and the RX480 23 (auto setting).All works fine with 0.30.6.I hope it no big problem for the next versions.Thanks.
